SCTX - Script Source:
scn moXscrXtrapXwritedynamicdata


short XFullDynamicUpdate


short XDoOnce


Ref XLOCALXProbeIDA1
Ref XLOCALXProbeIDA2
Ref XLOCALXProbeIDA3
Ref XLOCALXProbeIDA4
Ref XLOCALXProbeIDA5

float fQuestDelayTime
float XTimer


Begin Gamemode



;_____________________________________
; First Time Setup
;_____________________________________


	If XDoOnce == 0

		Set fQuestDelayTime to 0.001

		Set XLOCALXProbeIDA1 to "0probeUbent"
		Set XLOCALXProbeIDA2 to "0probeUapprentice"
		Set XLOCALXProbeIDA3 to "0probeUjourneyman"
		Set XLOCALXProbeIDA4 to "0probeUmaster"
		Set XLOCALXProbeIDA5 to "0probeUgrandmaster"

		Set XFullDynamicUpdate to 1

;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRAP: Probe IDs have been assigned to Memory"



		Set XDoOnce to 1

	ENDIF		





;_____________________________________
;Block Entry Unless Needed
;_____________________________________


	If XFullDynamicUpdate == 0

		Set XTimer to XTimer + GetSecondsPassed

		If XTimer < 10
			Return
		Else
			Set XTimer to 0
			Set XFullDynamicUpdate to 1
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "Dynamic Update Initiated"

		EndIF
	EndIF




;_____________________________________
;Probes
;_____________________________________

	If XFullDynamicUpdate == 1



		Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned to 0



		If Player.GetItemCount XLOCALXProbeIDA5 >= 1 && moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned == 0
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRAP:Grand-Master Probe Assigned as Default"		
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeID to XLOCALXProbeIDA5
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeMULTA5
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned to 1

		ElseIF Player.GetItemCount XLOCALXProbeIDA4 >= 1 && moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned == 0
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRAP:Master Probe Assigned as Default"
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeID to XLOCALXProbeIDA4
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeMULTA4
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned to 1

		ElseIF Player.GetItemCount XLOCALXProbeIDA3 >= 1 && moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned == 0
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRAP:JourneyMan Probe Assigned as Default"	
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeID to XLOCALXProbeIDA3
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeMULTA3
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned to 1

		ElseIF Player.GetItemCount XLOCALXProbeIDA2 >= 1 && moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned == 0
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRAP:Apprentice Probe Assigned as Default"		
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeID to XLOCALXProbeIDA2
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeMULTA2
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned to 1

		ElseIF Player.GetItemCount XLOCALXProbeIDA1 >= 1 && moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned == 0
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRAP:Bent Probe Assigned as Default"	
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeID to XLOCALXProbeIDA1
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeMULTA1
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned to 1

		EndIF


		IF moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned == 1
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhasPROBE to 1
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "Probe Assigned"	

		ElseIF moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned == 0
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhasPROBE to 0
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "Probe Not Assigned"			

		EndIF


;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRP: PROBES ASSIGNED Current Multiplier is %.2f Assign Check is %.2f", moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned
		Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.Xcheckcounter to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.Xcheckcounter + 1

	EndIF


;____________________________________
; Player Skills
;____________________________________

	IF XFullDynamicUpdate == 1

		Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdetectabletrap to  (1.25 * (Player.GetAV Security + (Player.GetAV Luck)/10 + (Player.GetAV Agility)/10) * 1.10)
		Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdisarmabletrap to  (1.25 * (Player.GetAV Security + (Player.GetAV Luck)/10 + (Player.GetAV Agility)/10) * moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI)
		Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXprobebreakchance to  (1.25 * (Player.GetAV Security + (25)/10 + (25)/5) * (1.2 - moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI))

;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRP: Skill Data has been Updated"
;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRP: HDetectable is %.2f HDisarmable is %.2f PBchance is %.2f ", moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdetectabletrap, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdisarmabletrap, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXprobebreakchance  	
		Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.Xcheckcounter to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.Xcheckcounter + 1



;__________________________________
; Trap Effects
;__________________________________

		If XFullDynamicUpdate == 1



			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00 to Rand 1 9

			If moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00 == 1
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA1
			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00== 2
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA2
			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00 == 3
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA3
			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00== 4
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA4
			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00 == 5
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA5
			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00 == 6
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA6
			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00 == 7
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA7	
			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00 == 8
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA8
			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00 == 9
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA9
			Else
				Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XcurrentTRAPeffect to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XSpellIDA1	

			ENDIF

;DEBUG TEXT: PrinttoConsole "MOTRP: Trap Spells have been assigned. Xdie00 is %.2f", moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XDie00

			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.Xcheckcounter to moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.Xcheckcounter + 1


		EndIF



;__________________________________
;Realise Full DYnamic Update
;__________________________________


		IF XFullDynamicUpdate == 1 && moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.Xcheckcounter == 3


			Set XFullDynamicUpdate to 0
			Set moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.Xcheckcounter to 0

;PrinttoConsole "MOTRP: Full Dynamic Update Complete."

;Else

;PrinttoConsole "MOTRP: Dynamic Update could not be completed."


		EndIF



	EndIF	
END	
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
